io.s4.zeno
Class Site

java.lang.Object
  io.s4.zeno.Site
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cluster.Site
public class Site
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cluster.Site

A Site at which a Job can run. The Site receives messages and processes them based on the Job that it acquires.

public EventMonitor eventMonitor()
Get the event monitor associated with this site. This is used to measure the arrival rate and average length of events processed by this site.

Returns:
